Text: RT Mondoweiss "Anti-semitism used to mean job discrimination and stigmatization of Jews as "kikes". Today the definition has shifted to mean any criticism of Israel because Israel supporters must do anything they can to prevent #BDS from entering the‚Ä¶ https://t.co/o03QFwdbTD"

The JDA allows for evidence-based criticism of Israeli policies without classifying such criticism as antisemitic unless it involves harmful generalizations or discrimination against Jews.
